value: The court of the cheateau is shown in the foreground with many figures and carriages, with the road to Paris beyond. Windows of the chateau and dependencies pricked. Verso covered with a strip of colored paper.

label: Description
value: In the center, a vignette showing a marriage ceremony. Below, two cupids hold a ribbon inscribed: "Come, lip to lip, in love's embrace / In me a faithful spirit trace / A life of love that will not die / Secure in its own constancy".
